legal.body: Please review the IOTA wallet Privacy Policy and Terms of Service

legal.checkbox: Iâ€™ve read and I accept the Privacy policy & ToS

password.title: Create a password for your wallet
password.body: Your password needs to be highly secure to encrypt and recover your Stronghold vault. Also, you will need this to send tokens from your wallet.

protect.title: Protect your wallet
protect.body_1: Set up your login PIN or Touch ID to ensure that only you can access the app.

pin.title: Set up PIN code
pin.body_1: Enter a 6-digit PIN below. You will be asked for this frequently when you access your device.

confirm_pin.title: Confirm the PIN code you created
confirm_pin.body: Confirm the PIN code you created

backup.title: Back up your wallet
backup.body_1: You will be shown a secret phrase. You will need these to restore your wallet and funds.
backup.body_2: Do not share this phrase with anyone. Your secret phrase can access your funds at any time from anywhere.
backup.body_3: If you lose this, you lose your funds.

recovery-phrase.title: Recovery phrase
recovery-phrase.body_1: Carefully copy the words in the exact order below. You can create a secondary backup on iCloud.
recovery-phrase.body_2: Keep this private and safely stored

verify-recovery-phrase.title: Verify recovery phrase
verify-recovery-phrase.body: Let's check you wrote down the phrase correctly. Click the words on the right in the exact order you have written them down.
